title: Quick question about 32 and 64-bit operating system
content:
I've been looking for devices that came with the android 64-bit OS before buying any but didn't see anything about that on the specs I found.

I saw in another post here that every Pixel phone runs on the 64 bit OS. Is that true for this phone as well? (Since I'm looking for a cheaper option than the newer Pixel phones at the moment)
